QuestData.Title: Terrace of the Chosen
QuestData.Description: This betrayal has cut deep into the heart of Zandalar. Half of the Zanchuli Council and their followers have sided with Zul and his... blood god.$b$bLucky for us not all of Zandalar is behind this betrayal.$b$bWe need to topple Zul's cultists before they can rally too many to their cause. Zanchul is the place to start.$b$bGo and see if you can muster any of the Zandalari still loyal to their king.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Kaza'jin the Wavebinder near the Terrace of the Chosen.
